text: Paweł Komorowski (14 August 1930 - 28 November 2011) was a Polish film director and screenwriter. He directed twenty films between 1955 and 2000. ==Selected filmography== * Pięciu (1964) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1930 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Polish film directors Category:Polish screenwriters Category:Film people from Warsaw
title: Paweł Komorowski
